title: FIRST FLOOR LUXURY APARTMENT WITH ATTACHED 2 CAR GARAGE!
posting_body: ['FIRST FLOOR APARTMENT Available FOR OCTOBER!', 'Beautiful spacious 2/2 with attached direct entry 2 car garage, with granite countertops, wood vinyl plank flooring, spacious closets, stainless steel appliances, natural woo cabinets, nickel finishes, 2 garden tubs, wood burning fireplace, with 2 balconies!', 'Experience upscale living that puts your comfort and convenience as the top priority.', 'Our unique community offers high end condo quality finishes and layouts with every apartment having spacious kitchens, abundant cabinet and storage space, large bedrooms, direct access two car garages.', 'Nestled in between the affluent Bent Tree and Willow Bend neighborhoods, the communities prime location offers access to incredible shopping, amazing restaurants, and exciting entertainment, all while living in a serene and peaceful setting.', 'RATES START AT $2600-$2800', '* prices change daily', 'Call for a tour Today!!!', 'COMMUNITY AMENITIES:', '● Resort Style Pool with lounge seating', '● Hot Tub', '● Newly remodeled business center', '● Monthly Wine Down Wednesday', '● 24- hour Fitness Center', '● Park with Dog Run plus access to Preston Trail', 'Preston Heights Apartments', '📍 6606 Mapleshade Ln Dallas, TX 75252', '📞', 'show contact info', '- text/call', '💻', 'Website: <URL>', '⏰ Office Hours: Mon-Fri: 9am - 6pm Sat: 10am - 5pm', 'do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers']
